original_text: And Jephthah made a vow to the Lord and said, “If you will give the Ammonites into my hand,
korean_text: 그가 여호와께 서원하여 이르되 주께서 과연 암몬 자손을 내 손에 넘겨 주시면

sentences.original_text: And Jephthah made a vow to the Lord
“If you will give the Ammonites into my hand,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 당신이 암몬 사람을 내 손에 붙이시면
